basics.name: Emanuel Romero
basics.label: Backend Developer
basics.summary: I am passionate about programming and developing effective solutions. I am an organized and capable person, which allows me to work efficiently on projects. I am committed to my growth and evolution, as well as to the work team. My main goal is to be an outstanding professional in the IT area, able to face and solve any challenge that may arise.
